column4: hey need  help. i can't connect my new SATA HD. what should i do?
why cant you connect it? you need a sata cable and a sata port on your motherboard
can you pastebin the output of           sudo fdisk -l     please
did you pastebin that command output?
im sorry i don't know how to do it. i googling now cos i don't want to bother you with little things :)
nothing is too small friend -- go to      Applications--> Terminal      then type        sudo fdisk -l            then copy the output to this site -- http://paste.ubuntu.com/
nothing,.,. ok is this a new 80gig harddrive?
what do you want to use theharddrive for?
i want to install a fresh ubuntu and make the my old one as back up
ok, do you mind if i pm you?
